children.value: Sign a 32-byte message with the private key, returning a 64-byte signature.

tags.title: example

children.value: Verify a 64-byte signature of a 32-byte message against the public key. Throws an Error if verification fails.

tags.title: example

children.value: Verify a list of 64-byte signatures as a batch operation. Throws an Error if verification fails.

tags.title: example

children.value: Aggregates multiple signatures of different private keys over the same message into a single 64-byte signature using a scheme that is safe from rogue-key attacks.
This non-interactive scheme requires the knowledge of all private keys that are participating in the multi-signature creation.

tags.title: example

children.value: Generate ell which is the hash over all public keys participating in a session.

tags.title: example

children.value: Creates the special rogue-key-resistant combined public key P by applying the MuSig coefficient to each public key P_i before adding them together.

tags.title: example

children.value: Creates a signing session. Each participant must create a session and must not share the content of the session apart from the commitment and later the nonce.

tags.title: example

children.value: Combines multiple nonces R_i into the combined nonce R.

tags.title: example

children.value: Creates a partial signature s_i for a participant.

tags.title: example

children.value: Verifies a partial signature s_i against the participant's public key P_i. Throws an Error if verification fails.

tags.title: example

children.value: Combines multiple partial signatures into a Schnorr signature (s, R) that can be verified against the combined public key P.

children.value: Hash transaction for signing a specific input.

Bitcoin uses a different hash for each signed transaction input.
This method copies the transaction, makes the necessary changes based on the
hashType, and then hashes the result.
This hash can then be used to sign the provided transaction input.
Hash transaction for signing a specific input for Bitcoin Cash.
